text: @realDonaldTrump You are an ass!  How dare you discuss Flynn at this time!  People are dying because you called the CoronaVirus a hoax!  You did absolutely nothing to prepare Americans for this deadly virus!  Only people like me, who watch REAL NEWS, were prepared!  People who watch Fox, weren't!
